revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Dungeon Ticket |image = [[File:DungeonTicket_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Dungeon Ticket''. |use = Allows entry to [[Dungeons|dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} |obtain = Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities|Viridian City]] for 100 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} }} ===Description=== This ticket grants access to all [[Dungeons]] in the [[Kanto]] region.
Tip: You gain [[Dungeon Tokens]] by re-capturing Pok√©mon. ===Acquisition=== Can be purchased at the [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Viridian City Shop]] ===Effects=== You can enter [[Dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
revision.comment: Protected "[[Dungeon Ticket]]": Protecting the whole wiki lets go ([Edit=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Move=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Delete=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Protect=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite))
